src:
Carlos Costa incendeia o Instagram com fotografia em roupa interior
07 Nov 2019, 14:45 by Jéssica Silva

O cantor Carlos Costa partilhou com os seus fãs um registo fotográfico bastante sensual e atrevido capturado durante a sua viagem a Nova Iorque.

Foi nesta quarta-feira, dia 6 de novembro, que o artista partilhou, na sua conta de Instagram, duas fotografias bastante ousadas que já lhe valeram diversos comentários.
“Depois disto, as raparigas vão é só ficar ceguinhas de inveja!”, “Beleza incondicional”, “O Instagram parou”, foram alguns dos comentários deixados pelos seus fãs.
RELACIONADAS


José Carlos Pereira na cama sem roupa interior: "Veste-te meu"!


João Montez incendeia internet com foto sem roupa na cama


Traída pelos flashes, namorada de Cristiano Ronaldo mostra roupa interior

text:
Carlos Costa Ignites Instagram With Underwear Photography
07 Nov 2019, 14:45 by Jessica Silva

Singer Carlos Costa shared with his fans a very sensual and sassy photographic record captured during his trip to New York.

It was this Wednesday, November 6th, that the artist shared, in his Instagram account, two very bold photographs that have already earned him several comments.
“After this, the girls will just be blinded with envy!”, “Unconditional beauty”, “Instagram has stopped” were some of the comments left by their fans.
RELATED


José Carlos Pereira in bed without underwear: "Get dressed mine"!


João Montez sets fire to internet with photo undressed in bed


Betrayed by the flashes, Cristiano Ronaldo's girlfriend shows underwear


Georgina Rodríguez falls in love with photo fans in underwear
